title: Actions for Bill H.448
textBeforeTable: “that is comparable to or more severe than aggravated sexual abuse as defined in 18 U.S.C. 2241,” Said section is further amended by inserting, in line 42, after the words, “by reason of a sex offense” the following:- “was aged 14 or over at the time of the offense and” Section 1. Section 178C of chapter 6 of the General Laws, as appearing in the 2008 Official Edition, is hereby amended by inserting, in line 41, after the words “who has been convicted of a sex offense or who” the following:- Miscellaneous Bill History
